name: Typewronger Books
measures: Typewronger Books is still open 11am-9pm every day of the week.
Email info@typewronger.com to order ANY BOOK YOU WANT delivered to your door!
Call 0131 556 5897 any time between 11am and 9pm for advice and recommendations as to what you should be reading next!

Browse what's in store by checking out [our google listing](https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbm=shop&tbs=root_cat%3A529627&q=books&lsf=seller%3A137640019%2Cstore%3A12362158331185141721%2Cs%3Al&biw=1920&bih=1057&fbclid=IwAR00Tx9rU34FKASdD8-ajCL9Zif0egrd-9UWW8ecttEuHEovQuYEeoBATuQ)!
Â£1.50 postage on small packages for the duration of the outbreak. We will also be offering free delivery to anyone living in the area immediately surrounding the shop (EH7).
As was always the case previously, customers living anywhere in Edinburgh who have mobility issues are still entitled to FREE POSTAGE.
